item.title: RHACM
item.description: RHACM https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_advanced_cluster_management_for_kubernetes/2.4/html-single/applications/index#gitops-config ArgoCD GitOps for Configuration Management GitOps instance per ManagedClusterSet Things that make you pick single, central: Good starting point Simple management, single place Things that make you change to distributed: One ArgoCD is overloaded. Separation of duties. One ArgoCD for Production. One ArgoCD for NonProduction. Separation of use. E.G. PCI Compliance, separation of elements in different clusters
